name: Red Hood Behind the Scene
description:
Inspired by Little Red Riding Hood story in which there is a little girl wandered alone in the middle of the forest to bring her sick grandmother a food and got deceived by wolf who wants to eat her successfully. in the end, the little girl has been saved by the hunter who hear her scream and ripped apart the wolf belly and help her to get out. 
There is a transformation on visual which i drew about especially on little girl bring her own axes with no hunter appearance. in my opinion, we should be aware of anything that can be harm for ourselves.there s many people who can faking their personality in front of us just to hurt and take advantage from anyone else (no exception for friends or family) in this society with full lies and deceit.
the first priority is we should save ourselves without waiting for someone being a guardian for us. that s okay when we felt so vulnerable but still not forgetting to raise our awareness in other not to get knock off by someone else who want take advantage of us.
-------------------------------
This is my first drop! i really try may best and i hope you enjoy may artwork. Thank you for appreciation
